column1: table #:  2 Percent distribution of employment and payrolls for the justice system by level of government, March 2003
series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts 2003, NCJ 212350
data source:  Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (CJEE)
authors:  Kristen A. Hughes and Steven W. Perry
Table 2.   Percent distribution of employment and payrolls for the justice system by level of government, March 2003

Notes:  Local government data are estimates subject to sampling variability.  The Federal Budget source provides only total employment for the Federal Government; that figure is included in the denominator used to compute the percent distribution of full time employees and full time equivalent employment for State and local governments.
